questions.label: How should we solve the emissions attributed to meat consumption ?
options: Ban the sale of meat from cattle and pigs
Make the use of imported cattle/pig fodder (thus produced abroad) illegal, and also making sales of non-organical beef illegal (thus requiring all beef to have an organic certification).
Just have meat be made costly due to a carbon tax (costs on methane emissions from meat)

questions.label: Should we ban pesticides (thus effectively making all plant-based agriculture organic) ?
